name: Like father like son
description: Like father like son This father has named his son, after one of his favorite iranian football players. My grandfather and his oldest son, Homayoun. Trying a pipe to smoke a cigarette. This is an old picture, before my grandfather stopped smoking for good. My uncle still is a smoker, like father like son. ----- (From a collection of 120mm ruined/expired color films,I have edited these scans over time to preserve memories hidden in their details)
